name: Crateria
description:
Welcome to Crateria! Fight trans-dimensional monsters in this crater's overgrown bog! How long can you survive?

Crateria is a jam game made over the course of a couple weeks, with code by Robotic Sarcasm and art by Jank Hambrams.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD Keys
  • Aiming: Mouse
  • Shooting: Left Click
  • Weapon Change: 1-3 Keys
  • Exit to Menu: ESC Key

Credits:

  • Code: Robotic Sarcasm - Twitter | Itch.io | Tumblr
  • Art: Jank Hambrams - Twitter | Itch.io | Website
  • Music: Ben "Abstraction" Burnes - Twitter | Website
  • SFX: BFXR - Website
